description: This modpack features titles as a way to showcase your achievements to others. Quite useful in modpack packed with challanges, don't you think?

<text>Some titles are obtained from achivements and loot from mobs, you can find a full list of those <link href="https://github.com/Aurilux/Titles/wiki/Titles-Included-With-the-Mod"><underline><blue>here</blue></underline></link></text>
Every quest that has a pentagonal icon will reward you with title.
